title: The Innocents
writer: Pascal Bonitzer (adaptation), Pascal Bonitzer (dialogue), Anne Fontaine (adaptation), Anne Fontaine (dialogue), Sabrina B. Karine (screenplay), Philippe Maynial (based on an original concept created by), Alice Vial (screenplay)

plot: In 1945 Poland, a young French Red Cross doctor who is sent to assist the survivors of the German camps discovers several nuns in advanced states of pregnancy during a visit to a nearby convent.
